Package paoo.game.handler

Class KeyHandler

java.lang.Object
paoo.game.handler.KeyHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class KeyHandler extends Object implements KeyListener
Handles keyboard input for the game, managing different input behaviors based on the current game state. This class implements KeyListener to capture and process keyboard events for movement, menu navigation, and game state transitions.

      public boolean isUpPressed()
      Returns whether the UP key is currently pressed.
      Returns:
      true if UP key is pressed, false otherwise

    • keyTyped

      public void keyTyped(KeyEvent e)
      Handles key typed events. Currently not implemented.
      Specified by:
      keyTyped in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the key event

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed(KeyEvent e)
      Handles key pressed events by delegating to appropriate state-specific methods based on the current game state.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the key event containing information about the pressed key

    • titleState

      public void titleState(int code)
      Handles key input when the game is in the title screen state. Manages menu navigation (W/S keys) and menu selection (ENTER key).
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • playState

      public void playState(int code)
      Handles key input during active gameplay. Manages player movement (WASD), game pause (P), inventory access (I), interaction (ENTER), options menu (ESCAPE), and debug features (T, 1-3, R).
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • pauseState

      public void pauseState(int code)
      Handles key input when the game is paused. Only responds to the P key to unpause the game.
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • dialogueState

      public void dialogueState(int code)
      Handles key input during dialogue sequences. ENTER key advances dialogue and handles teleportation if ready. ESCAPE key opens the options menu.
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • inventoryState

      public void inventoryState(int code)
      Handles key input when the inventory is open. WASD keys navigate through inventory slots, I key closes inventory.
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • gameOverState

      public void gameOverState(int code)
      Handles key input when the game over screen is displayed. W/S keys navigate menu options, ENTER key selects option (retry or return to title).
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • gameEndState

      public void gameEndState(int code)
      Handles key input when the game end screen is displayed. W/S keys navigate menu options, ENTER key selects option (return to title or exit).
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • optionsState

      public void optionsState(int code)
      Handles key input when the options menu is open. Manages navigation through options submenus, volume adjustments (A/D keys), and menu selection. ESCAPE key returns to gameplay.
      Parameters:
      code - the key code of the pressed key

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased(KeyEvent e)
      Handles key released events to reset movement flags when keys are released. Only handles movement keys (WASD).
      Specified by:
      keyReleased in interface KeyListener
      Parameters:
      e - the key event containing information about the released key
